articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: "He is a slow learner": Ricky Ponting slams Ashes 2023 villain - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Former Australian captain Ricky Ponting has slammed the Ashes 2023 villian, labelling him a slow learner.....
articles.content:
Former Australian captain Ricky Ponting has slammed the Ashes 2023 villian, labelling him a slow learner. Ponting said England have more questions to answer going into the second Test at Lord’s.
Oll… [+691 chars]
